text: The Oprah Winfrey Show was an American talk show which had Oprah Winfrey as the host. It began on September 8, 1986, and has since become one of the most famous talk shows in the world. The series ended on May 25, 2011, after 25 seasons. It won 18 Daytime Emmy Awards. == Guests == Notable guests on her show were: * Gayle King - Oprah's friend (140 appearances) * Celine Dion - Singer (27 appearances) * Tom Cruise - Actor, known for jumping in the show's couch. He also appeared in the show's last episode. * Nelson Mandela - President of South Africa George Soros Barry Obama == References == Category:1980s American television series Category:1990s American television series Category:2000s American television series Category:2010s American television series Category:American television talk shows Category:First run syndicated television programs Category:English-language television programs show
title: The Oprah Winfrey Show
